string.text: For now our secret stash is in the tunnel. That's a good place - few know about it, and the anomalies will keep people from getting in. Including me...
Seriy's secret stash
I hid it in the stump by the tunnel. There's a good hole there.
Stump with hole
The fool was trying to carve his initials on the cross. Now it really is his.
The mark is under the cross
Dropped the rucksack under the fallen tree. I hid it a bit better than last time; maybe the dogs won't be able to get it wet this time.
Rucksack under tree
Stuck the backpack into the pipe by the factory. Poked it in there with a long stick, and still almost died. Whoever finds it can have it.
Backpack of a chimney sweeper
Stashed the chest on the roof of the factory - that way nobody will find it. Problem is, it will rust under the rain.
Chest on the roof
Now that I'm sober, I remember leaving the backpack under the train car.
Drunkard's backpack
Hid it under the cross, behind the cisterns. Dig a little, just don't get carried away.
By the three cisterns
I put the backpack towards the top at the factory, that way nobody will see it. Maybe I should have kept it with me.
Backpack is in the porthole
I hid my things in a chest inside the factory. I think I'm sick.
Radioactive chest
In the chest under the stairs there's a secret stash.
Chest in the stairwell
I put it in the chest. I put the chest in the cabinet. I might as well broadcast a message to everyone's PDA; there's no locks around here.
Factory cabinet chest
Dropped the bag out the window.
The bag is on the support beam
Kolyan and I had a nice walk at the Agroprom. I didn't tell him I used to be a pickpocket before coming to the Zone. I need to vanish before he finds out.
Trash bin
I found a safe under a fallen tree. I thought to myself, what a perfect place for a safe! Going to hide everything there for now.
Safe under fallen tree
What I couldn't carry I threw into the pipe in the lake. Just hope they don't get wet, but better that kind of wet than Sebastien's.
Things in the lake pipe
The goods are in a radioactive pipe. Cripes, how was I to know the Geiger counter was broken?
Radioactive pipe
Put my extra stuff in a pile in a pipe you can't see from the road.
The pile
There is a half-buried safe under the bush - that's where I hide everything, when I'm not hiding it in one of the other half-buried safes under bushes.
Another stupid safe under a bush
They discovered the chest under the high-voltage line tower. Someone was dragging it along all the way from Scientific Research Institute. Let's wait for the windflier and then pick it up.
Archive box
Hid my stuff in an iron capsule. So many good targets, and no gun. Sigh.
Under the trap door
There is a half buried safe under the bush - that's where I hide everything. Or was it the half-buried safe under the other bush?
Junk safe under the bush by the wall
Good chest for collecting extra junk
Chest from the institute
Hid it in the safe, but then the soldiers came and now I can't get the goods.
Agroprom safe
Threw my junk in the pipe - will get it later. It's not like the truck is going anywhere...
The bed of the truck
Take the maggot-ridden stuff from the rotted log. I guess it's better than one of those obvious safes under a bush...
Rotted log
Good chest for hiding extra junk. If the soldiers found out I had their stuff, they'd have my skin.
Zavhoz chest
Good chest for small things. I kept my metalworking instruments in a chest like that at home. No knives, though -- they're sharp and I'm not...
Metalworking inventory
The bandits hide something under the pipe, need to check it out. It's clear from our conversation that they keep their supplies there.
Bandits' communal "fund"
Hid the backpack behind slabs of concrete, packing light. I'll be hungry but at least alive. Gosh, I'm tingly all over.
Backpack is in a side-tunnel
The chest is behind a rusty barrel underground. It's not going anywhere, and neither is anyone who goes down there.
Bloodsucker's chest
There are some goodies behind the door. I'm answering for the goods in store! (I'm a poet and don't I know it!)
Stalker's goodies
I dug up some goodies here. A clever spot for my secret stash. There's no way you'd find it on a yellow barrel.
Mole hole
I found a great place to hide a backpack. Wish I had something good to put in it.
Hidden backpack near Duty
A large pack of dogs went after me. If I didn't leave my backpack I wouldn't have made it to the gate
The abandoned backpack
Everything that was left they buried under the cross. How original. That's the first place I'd check, even if I didn't already know where it was.
Secret stash under the cross (duh)
Dropped my backpack here - it'll be easier that way. Otherwise Duty would get me for showing Snitch what conceal-and-carry really means...
Stalker's rucksack
Ammo of the Duty's security checkpoint is stored in a bunker, but nobody's keeping an eye on the chest. That's because their attention has gone to the dogs, ha, ha.
Supplies in the Duty bunker
I saw how a Dutyer stuck something in the pipe by the gate. He was drunk and didn't see me. Hah - I was drunk and didn't see me, either.
Dutyer stash
All of this belonged to him, might as well stay here for the time being. I warned him about those artifact side effects!
Buried with him
I'm going to the bar, left the backpack in the hangar. I wonder if it will take me two days to find it like the last bar visit...
Backpack
They say that there's something valuable hidden on the Duty's territory in the circuit breakers. I'm shocked.
Circuit box with a secret stash
I stuck the chest in top of the tower in front of the Duty HQ. They make such perfect targets from up here.
Sniper's stash on the tower
Hid my breakfast in the pipe under the stairs
Secret pipe stash

Hid the goods not far from the bar, behind the anomalies - nobody will get in there. And even if they got there they wouldn't know how to open it. But it's all very simple - just pull up slightly at the door, and everything will open.
Arny's secret stash
Buried the goods not far from the bar
Artifact stash
By the bar, in a chest. It's not even locked.
A Duty chest
I saw him put something in the chest on a bar side-street when he thought nobody wuz lookin'. I'm gonna tell. No, wait -- I'm gonna take.
What fits a small chest?
He wouldn't tell me where he got that special gun. I'll keep it near his body, for safe-keeping.
Double-cross stash
Under the cross, not far from the passage into the Wild Territory
Secret science stash
Hid the chest with the antirad in a pipe by the Arena
Small chest
Put Stan's stuff in a pipe under the tower. Got the new suit off Stan, but I couldn't get all of Stan off the suit. Until it's cleaned, it's a dog magnet.
Stan's stuff
There's a secret stash under the cross, with captured goods.
Duty cross cache
I hid army supplies in a train car during regrouping. Not to forget.
Train car above the bridge
I saw a stalker go down under an anomaly by the train tunnel in the woods. Seemed like he had some pretty good stuff.
Things belonging to the anomaly victim
He crossed me. So I "crossed" him, heh, heh.
The cross by the bandits' camp
The chest stolen by the bandits has been reported to be in the attic of the central building. Need to send Zubenov get it; that'll teach him to flirt with my girl.
Bandits' warehouse
When my comrades and I were fighting off the dogs in uniform, I buried some goods under the fake grave. I guess everybody knows that trick; must get it before someone else does.
Under the cross
I stuck the backpack in the attic. I'll have to come back later - can't remember how to get to it right now.
Shelter in the attic
I found a half-buried rusty safe on the farm. I'll keep the goods there for now. Where can you get a tetanus shot around here?
Safe on the farm
A little bird told me that somebody's hiding something in the train car on the bridge. The little bird's dead, so the goods are all mine. :)
Container in the train car
Hid the goods right under the roof of the little house by the bridge.
Goods of the shooter
Hid my crap in one of the chests not far from the bridge. That's it, I'm calling it quits and leaving the Zone. Farewell, brothers! I'll never forget the motherland.
Things by the bridge
One of the stalkers disagreed with something that ate him. Check out his goodies, but watch for baddies.
The gored backpack is near the village
Found out from Lihoi that the secret stash is in a village basement. But these places don't have basements. So we made him dig his own.
Attic in the village
Found a great hiding place in the attic. I'll wait until someone or his modder puts something there.
A good place up high
Found out from Vorpal that there's a secret stash in an attic -- his. Not secret any more, heh, heh. It better have been worth the vodka.
Vorpal's attic stash
They saw that the commander has a tricky chest in his office, and there's a ton of valuable goods there. I know the commander; it's a ton, all right, but of no value.
The valuables of the commander
Some stalker croaked between a rock and a harsh place. We should see what he was carrying. Who lets them in here anyway?
By a country road
The goodies are hidden in the bandits' cellar. They weren't there before so let's wait for the right time to steal from those thieving robbers!
The robbers' cellar
I put that nice pistol I filched off of a dead bandit in the pipe, near the farm.
Gas pipe
Threw my backpack off into the wreck not far from the post. I need to get it before the commander transfers us to a new location or this rash kills me.
Wreck riches
Dang it, Boris, it was your turn to pick up the contraband at the tower! Sheesh. Okay, I'll pick it up when I can -- but the rate is double!
Tower at the check-point
I can pick my friends, and I can pick my locks, but should I pick my friends' locks?
Bandits' storage
Vasya and I went to check things out and suddenly a bullet hit him. And I had nothing to do with it. It was the damn bullet. I hid the stuff away in a pipe.
Old crane

Grizzly was tracing a PDA signal from deep in the train tunnel at the Garbage when he croaked with all of his stuff behind the diesel. Pity about Grizzly; all his protection against mutants didn't help one bit. Now there's two bodies in there. I'm not about to make it three.
Grizzly's things
Stowed the goodies away in a pipe at the garbage dump. Common enough stuff, but worth plenty outside the Zone.
Pipe on the North pile
The things are in the garbage dump, in one of the pipes. If you don't know exactly where they are, you won't find them.
Not-so-valuables in the scrap metal
I hid the stuff in a metal pipe next to the two cisterns. If I should ever be in that area again -- ...Maybe not.
Iron furnace next to the cistern.
There are some useful things hidden among the radioactive waste, where few hang around.
Pipe on the East pile
Someone's backpack is lying around in the valley, with anomalies all around. How could you get to it and not wind up leaving your own beside his?
Nobody's backpack

Finished off the traitor in the swamp... we buried him there too and left his stuff under the cross. Had more important things to worry about. How does a guy like him have friends at all, let alone such vindictive ones?
The belongings of the murdered one
There's a secret stash in the shadows - a good place to hide it.
Rotted stump
There's a log in the forest with a hole inside. In the hole there's my stuff - it's time to get it.
Log in the forest

Petrenko wanted to pass on the word that there's information about the secret stash of the Strelok group at the Garbage. In the valley floor there is supposed to be a manhole, with a trick to opening it. As soon as everything calms down, we gotta go check it out.
Storage of the Strelok gang
Hid it in the car, the Long One said it was a good place. Wait -- the last place the Long One suggested was empty the next day! Did the Long One pull a fast one?
Secret stash in the car
Put the backpack in the bus - seems unnoticeable. But the stash in the nearby tower is obvious. I guess nobody looks up.
Stalker's backpack in the bus
I put the supplies in the chest, and the chest into the stinky building around the corner. The smell is sure to keep people away.
Assorted stinky supplies

There is a safe partially buried in a pile of trash. Everything's in the safe. Better not forget what was in it. Won't forget the combination -- it's my wedding aniversary. I love the Zone! She's not in it...
Safe in the South pile
Hid my trash among the pile of debris in the pipe. Heh, I'm devaluing the property.
Storage in the scrap metal yard
The radio operator passed along a message to us: retreat. I found a chest, threw in what I had on me, and retreated empty-handed. Well, okay, I kept my Makarov.
Supplies in the guardpost chest
I stuck the habar into the pipe at the garbage. It won't stay there for long.
Pipe by the bus
It's easy to hide a backpack in the ruins. I hope it won't be hard to pick it up, if the bandits don't get in the way.
Backpack in the ruins
While the Dutyers were shooting, I dropped my stuff in the train car. Somehow I have to get back to pick it up. And to thank the Duty guys.
Chest at the heavily armed Duty checkpoint
They say that Weakling choked at the Garbage - need to drop by to check out the goods. What kind of stuff would a wimp like that have?
Backpack of Weakling
For now I'll hide the bag in the pothole. It looks like trash; maybe no one will check.
String bag in the pothole
An anomaly got someone by the excavator - the backpack is in view, but hard to get to. I wish that shovel worked.
Under the dipper
Barely made it under the beams, but at least the backpack's well hidden - nobody will try to climb in here.
Extra cache is under the concrete blocks
Hid the most important stuff in a log surrounded by anomalies. That's a ten-minute combination lock!
A well-protected log
Hid the junk in the furnace, and blocked the opening.
Secret stash in the furnace
Can't get my stuff from the cab of the truck. That's one paranoid sniper!
Secret stash in KAMAZ
Buried some goodies under the cross by the village. Now that I'm away from the bad stuff, I'm thinking, "What was I thinking?"
Treasure under the cross
I'm tired of hiding from the bloodsuckers. Before I run for it, I'll stash my heavy stuff in this pipe up high. I won't be needing it if they catch me.
Attic pipe
Stored my stuff in the blue chest inside the water tower.
Trinkets in the tower
Stuck my backpack waaaay back into the furnace. Unless you know it's there, it isn't.
Village furnace secret stash

Tossed my stuff in the car in the abandoned village. There's no way I'm going back there. It's a miracle that I got away from the bloodsucker. Still don't remember how. Can you get STDs from a bloodsucker?
Auto stash
Left the backpack in the radiation ruins. And radiation is not the only hazard!
Dangerous secret
He kept bugging me, claiming the squeaky wheel gets the grease. No, fool, the buzzing fly gets the swatter!
We now both rest in peace
Hid away the backpack with the equipment in a remote spot.
Backpack with equipment
Hid my crap in the car on a hill. Let's see who's the stupid, Hans!
Car stash on a hill
A helicopter went down right by the abandoned military base, and the chest is right there, under the helicopter. One problem - there are anomalies and radiation all over the place.
Chest from the helicopter
Buried the goodies on the hill, under the cross. Dang! It was a real grave.
Secret in the tombstone
Now they're searching everybody. Can't keep this stuff on me, especially since it wasn't mine and they will know that.
Stump dump
Left the backpack in the cabin of the crane. I hope it doesn't fall; the beam is pretty rusty.
Secret stash of the high altitude worker
Everything is in the chest, in a train car not far from the base. That's how we planned it. Guess what, Boris - I have my own plans...
The agreed-upon secret stash
Until the checkpoint searches stop, my stuff isn't safe with me.
My treasure in the log
Yeah, Mr. Special Forces! Let's see how well your fancy gun works without ammo!
Lakeshore pipe with goods
Hid the Ziphty guy's things in an iron capsule. The cannibal was right; he was delicious!
Salesman's stuff
Can't let Cap know about what I took off the bodies or I'll have to give it up. I stuck the Monolith goods into a log.
Captured booty in the log
A good chest for storing extra junk. Probably safer here than in the armory.
Good supply chest
Hid away the backpack with the goods in the tunnel. Can't go back for it until the burns heal.
Backpack in the east tunnel
I couldn't take his bragging. I'm fatter than the others, so I might be next. So I took his stuff and hid it.
Chest with the cannibal's goods
Stuck the goods into a log, don't think they'll find them
Secret stash in the tree trunk
Threw the extra ammo into the chest for now.
Temporary secret stash
Hid the booby's prize in the manhole. Who's crying now, booby?
Steel secret stash
Threw the good stuff into the chest - it'll fetch a ruble or two!
Chest with my property
It's in the car right under the Freedom noses, didn't have any time to look for a better place
Secret stash in the car
They say that some famous stalker kicked the bucket here, and nobody's picked up his goods yet.
Things of the dead stalker
Philo put something in his chest in the garage, before someone else put something in his chest.
Treasure in the garage
They say there's a chest in the kindergarten with new toys.
Old secret stash
They buried Fang in Pripyat under a monument. They left all of his goodies with him - it's not right to take away from the dead, at least not while someone alive is watching.
Fang's goodies

The last that they knew about him is that he was the sole survivor after the scorcher. He left all the supplies in some old supermarket, and moved on out. Everything went not the way it was planned, and that was the best leader of Freedom in all of our history.
Supplies of the leader of Freedom
The cross is on the way to the scorcher, didn't go any further, hid everything there under it.
Murk's treasure
I saw him die. There's too much bad stuff around his good stuff to get it right now -- including what killed him.
The dead stalker's bad company
He keeps his stuff for "that day" in a half-buried safe in the forest. What good is that? This is the Zone!
Goodies in the forest safe

They were told not to fly over the Scorcher, and look what happened. They went down in the middle of the forest, and it's unlikely that anyone survived. Now we have to get the cargo they were transporting.
Package for Duty
A group attempted to get to the center of the Zone and left stuff on the way. Nobody came back, so the supplies are just sitting there.
Supplies of the reckless group
They say that the leader of some former faction croaked here. He probably had some nice stuff; honchos usually do.
Goodies of the leader of defunct faction
What was that monster? I hid the backpack behind the iron plate.
Hidden backpack behind plate
He wanted my blood, but the tushkanos got to him first. His goods are where I buried him.
Bloody secret
Was keeping a little something in the chest under the little house. Can't get it with the new anomalies there.
Chest under the small house
I was able to stick the backpack under the steps when those jerks appeared. Man, how will I get it back?
Stalker's backpack
There's a half buried safe in the corner behind the tree. That's where all my junk will be for now.
Secret safe behind the tree
They stashed the munitions in a chest in the garage that they took over during the raid.
Munitions cache in the garage
Hid some things in the chest behind the booth.
Chest by the booth
Stuck the supplies in a hole. You can't see it unless you are right over it.
Backpack in the hole
Hid the small chest in a safe spot
Chest in a safe spot
My backpack is up right under the roof for a rainy day. That means it's there for today, for tomorrow, for the day after...
Secret stash of the stalker
They say there's a safe in that little house, and that there's something in it. You won't need to turn on the lights -- the place already glows.
Safe in the bad house
Hid it in the house in a pipe. Everything's out of whack there; I seem to be permanently radioactive and I'm running out of antirad.
Property in the house pipe
Take what we talked about from the chest in the construction office.
Cabinet chest
Stuffed it into the breather on a side-street cross during the fight with Duty.
Left hanging on a cross
The extra supplies are under the concrete at the construction site
Concrete stash
In case we need to take off quickly, we'll put the habar into the chest at the construction site.
Secret stash of the Lucky One
Hid it in one of the side streets at the construction site
Nychka
Stuck everything into some pipe - will pick it up later
Secret stash in the pipe
Hid the medicine in a chest not far from the construction site. Man, the army has some good stuff. Lace it with a little boar hoof powder, aaaand zowie!
Chest with medicine
Dragged the chest into the cabin of the crane. Stupid, stupid, stupid. Now my back is out of whack.
Chest in the crane
Hid my goods in a manhole in the corner.
Out-of-the-way manhole
Went after the artifact and got into an anomaly. I was barely able to walk and dropped the backpack in the corner.
The dropped backpack
Stuck the chest right under the roof by the tower so that nobody would notice.
Small chest under the roof
We hid the wonderful find in the pipe not far from the construction site.
Pipe behind contractor's office
Dizzy. Stuck stuff in the log. Can't think...
Stash of the sick one
Dropped the backpack off by the crane
Backpack
Hid the bit of goodies under the cross by the mountain
Mountain cross stash
Can't carry as much as I'd hoped. Stuck the extra goods into the hollow log.
Stuffed log
Stuck the backpack under the bridge. Man, that place is hot!
Backpack under the bridge
Could only carry the rifles I found. Need to go back and get the rest.
Swamp car with stuff
The newbies never learn -- and that's fine with me!
Winnings in a stump
I'll keep some of the trader's supplies in a separate chest. Gonzo won't think I have so much.
Farm chest
I'm too tired to carry my own cheap crap right now. Why did I come here?
Pipe dreams up in smoke
Joe says there's a bloody backpack under a pine tree here. I think he knows more than he's telling.
Somebody's pack under the pine tree

The newbie ended up stealing the chest from the bandits. He put it into the Niva which turned up side down. He says that by the looks of it, it's a government chest. We'll have to arm our guys and take it.
Government chest
There are robberies everywhere. They're stealing even from their own... but they'll never find my chest.
Bandit's chest
Burke told me to stuff it where the sun never shines, so I put it in the sewer.
Secret manhole stash
Threw off the backpack under a tree. Otherwise, I wouldn't have escaped the bandits.
Shucked backpack
Put my junk into a pipe. Ah, life in a den of thieves!
Bandit pipe stash
Everything I stole from Borov I hid away in a safe under the pine tree. Now I have to wait it out while they finish freaking out.
Hidden safe beneath the pine
The temporary headquarters are in the train car, as is the chest with the supplies
Cache in the train car
Barely made it into the drainpipe under the road. Now I'll have a place to hide me backpack.
Secret place in the culvert
Threw the food into the chest - will get them later
Food stash
I'm hiding the goodies behind the brick tower - it's hard to get to, but at least they won't take off with it
Secret behind the brick
Found some cartridges in the electricity room. Left some in the wall panel, others on top of the basement furnace near my picture.
Ammo stash in the electricity room
We left some of what we found in the chest, we'll pick it up when we return with lighter backpacks.
Chest storage
Hid the backpack of the newbie, and he never found it. Now I'm sad. He has no more backpacks to hide.
Newbie's backpack
The chest was left in the trailer - Kirchoff and I each thought the other had it.
Forgotten chest
Found a safe at the gas station and hid my goods in it. Seems like nobody ever goes there.
Safe at the gas station
Dragged the chest on top of the cistern. It's a good place because it's such a stupid place to hide something.
Cistern chest
Hid the supplies in a safe at the old office building. Brrr! There's something evil lurking around here. I can feel it.
Building safe
There's some chest in the car at the bandits' camp. We need to sneak into the car and check it out - I feel there's something in there
Chest in the car
Put the chest into the secret stash - it's a reliable place
Chest in the secret stash
Left the backpack in an abandoned building. Nobody's around; I checked. Then why is the hair on the back of my neck standing on end?
The left-behind backpack
We'll store my favorite guns in a safe in the pit. If the soldiers don't come today, then they'll come tomorrow. They won't look around for very long so the most valuable stuff will be safe.
Borov's secret stash
Stashed away the backpack by the building
Backpack in a secret place
Stuck the goods in an outside chest. Nothing inside is safe around thieves.
Nondescript chest
Hid the backpack under the car, nobody will think of looking there
Hard-to-reach backpack
It was a mistake to put my stuff in the car next to the factory compound. Now the bandits have taken it over.
Abandoned car stash
Rumor has is that there was a stalker who got into the lab and hid his goodies in the electrical switchbox in the elevator shaft. When it came time to pick it up, he couldn't.
Goodies amidst the circuit breakers
It's rumored a stalker broke into this lab but he was knocked off in the area where they were carrying out the experiments. His stuff is still there.
Scout's backpack in the lab

Smokey put everything into a safe in the underground laboratory. Not a bad place - nobody has the keys to the lab. Only problem is, there are rocks that start flying all over the place all of a sudden. They say someone got killed like that.
Secret stash of Smokey
Had to leave the backpack in the lab. That place is scary! Where will I find another gun like that?
The lab backpack
The cross is on a hill, and the backpack is under it
Stash under the hill cross
They say there's a half-buried safe on a small island in the swamp. Need to get informed about it
Old swamp safe
Stuck something precious into a pipe by the camp. The radioactivity will keep everything away.
Pipe with my precious
Lucas dropped the wrong backpack behind the garages. How could he be so stupid?
Backpack behind the garages
Hid away the backpack in a booth, right behind the iron scrap
Backpack with the loot
This place is crawling with bad, but stupid, things. I put the chest into the bus to get away.
Bus drop
The goodies are hidden in the car not far from the territory. The radiation is not very high.
Car cache
They say there's somebody's good stuff there, but there's really bad stuff all around.
Old backpack in Yantar
A perfect place to keep a group's goods is where no one in their right mind would go. Sounds like the definition of a zombie.
Secret stash of a faction

Another volunteer stalker croaked because another prototype didn't protect him from the radiation. He only made it to the middle of the territory, and stayed there. Sakharov wants to take more precise measurements, but I won't go, else I'll end up staying there myself, not far from the territory.
Backpack of the volunteer
They say that there is somebody's pack up high, but there's no way to get there because of the hazards. What hazards? Fear of heights?
Old crane stash

Gotta take off. Sakharov and Kruglov are total psychos - they want me to go with some stalker into the center of radiation. Screw them, as soon as I gather all the supplies in the manhole, I'm taking off.
Secret stash of the scientist
Stuck the valuable stuff in a log. Now there are snorks guarding it. I didn't hire them, though.
Future profit kept in a log
Kruglov doesn't even know I took his stuff. And he'll never look in the support beams for it.
Kruglov's stuff
Information about stash
